column5: Better late than never.  We went up for 3 days and had some good luck with the bass.  Nothing gigantic but some pretty decent ones.  They stay at memquisit was great.  We found that most of the bass were near shore at points or by fallen trees.  Here are a few pics of of the trip.  Here is a nice double header my brother and I had,    Our Cabin    Best pike of the trip.  I'm holding the fish but it was my brother beside me that caught it,    Best Largemouth of the weekend, released right after the pictures,     And finally a nice sunset on our last night
Some nice fish there, thanks for sharing.
Looks like you both had a good time Toddy. I've never been to Memquisit. Thanks for the report.
Great report and pics Toddyc20  Looks like you guys had a good time up there. Some nice looking bronze back  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Looks like you had a good time.  The "arm" is such a great area to fish.  Thanx for the report.
hey great report looks like a great time!  cheers!
Nice report!  and a piggie LMB!
Really looks like a very nice camp and I boat past there.   Congrats on a successful week-end.
Wow that was a fat largemouth, nice fish. Thanks for sharing!
Some beauty pics and fish.  Congrats  I've driven by there many times in the boat.  It sure looks nice from the water.
Nice pics... nice cabin!  Thanks for the report!
Looks like a nice place, thanks for the report...
You guys take 9 rods out between the two of you?   lol nice.
Some nice beeyaaaasss fer sure there.
There were actually 4 of us on the boat.  Although i wish i had 9 rods.  Would save a lot of time on changing lures.  Thanks for all the response.
